# get average (mean and weighted mean) transcriptome

```{r get-transcriptome}

getCounts = function(cells, weights){
  current.counts = counts[,colnames(counts) %in% cells]
  current.counts = current.counts[,order(colnames(current.counts) )]
  current.counts = ( current.counts %*% weights )/length(cells)
  return(current.counts)
}

K = 25

estimated.counts.mean = bplapply(mapping.marker, function(x){
  cells = x$cells.mapped
  cells = cells[1:K]
  idx = order(cells)
  cells = cells[idx]
  weights = rep(1, times = length(cells))
  return(getCounts(cells, weights)) 
}) 
estimated.counts.mean = do.call(cbind, estimated.counts.mean)
colnames(estimated.counts.mean) = names(mapping.marker)
rownames(estimated.counts.mean) = rownames(sce.atlas)
saveRDS(estimated.counts.mean, file = paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/marker_K25_mean.rds"))

estimated.counts.weightedMean = bplapply(mapping.marker, function(x){
  cells = x$cells.mapped
  cells = cells[1:K]
  idx = order(cells)
  cells = cells[idx]
  weights = x$distances.mapped
  weights = weights[1:K]
  weights = 1/weights
  weights = weights[idx]
  return(getCounts(cells, weights)) 
}) 
estimated.counts.weightedMean = do.call(cbind, estimated.counts.weightedMean)
colnames(estimated.counts.weightedMean) = names(mapping.marker)
rownames(estimated.counts.weightedMean) = rownames(sce.atlas)
saveRDS(estimated.counts.weightedMean, file = paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/marker_K25_weightedMean.rds"))

```
